helpText: Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization.
helpTextGroup: Edit, delete, or reorder categories for content in this group.
helpTextDescription: Remember that other members of your organization may have already assigned these categories to their items, and editing the schema will update those items accordingly
helpTextGroupDescription: Remember that other members of the group may have already assigned these categories to their items, and editing the schema will update those items accordingly

message.single: One item is assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from this item.
message.multiple: ${number} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items.
message.unknown: Items assigned to this category: ${number}. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items.

message.single: One item is assigned to this category. Updating the category will update the item to use "${newTitle}".
message.multiple: ${number} items are assigned to this category. Updating the category will update the items to use "${newTitle}".
message.unknown: Items assigned to this category: ${number}. Updating the category will update the items to use "${newTitle}".

custom.message: Create your own categories to organize content within your organization.
custom.messageGroup: Create your own categories to organize content within this group.
